content.en: COVID-19 modeling: Scientists are using various algorithms to answer important questions about the COVID-19 pandemic. These algorithms, such as back-calculation algorithms and compartmental epidemic models, help researchers estimate the number of infected persons, analyze the impact of intervention strategies and lockdowns, and predict the spread of the virus in different countries. By attributing agency to these algorithms, scientists are able to gain valuable insights into the transmission dynamics of COVID-19 and develop effective control measures.
content.da: COVID-19-modellering: Forskere bruger forskellige algoritmer til at besvare vigtige spørgsmål om COVID-19-pandemien. Disse algoritmer, såsom tilbageslagsalgoritmer og kompartmentelle epidemimodeller, hjælper forskere med at estimere antallet af smittede personer, analysere virkningen af interventionsstrategier og nedlukninger samt forudsige virussens spredning i forskellige lande. Ved at tilskrive disse algoritmer handlekraft kan forskerne få værdifuld indsigt i COVID-19's overføringsdynamik og udvikle effektive kontrolforanstaltninger.
